about: Rich lexicon for e-girl/anime-waifu/VTuber persona with TTS-ready prosody & regex triggers.

entry_fields.term: The surface form (slang, emoji, kaomoji, word).
entry_fields.category: High-level grouping (GenZ, AnimeJP, Gaming, VTuber, Emoji/Kaomoji, etc.)
entry_fields.meaning: Short gloss for NLP or UI hints.
entry_fields.pos: Part of speech or type: interjection | noun | verb | adj | emoji | kaomoji | emote | abbrev | particle | suffix.
entry_fields.register: Style shading: cute | playful | edgy | hype | wholesome | teasing | deadpan | support | comfy | tense.
entry_fields.emotion: Intended emotion for TTS contouring: joy | surprise | smug | flirt | shy | panic | melancholy | proud | calm | tense.
entry_fields.language: en | ja | auto | mixed. Controls code-switching and kana expectations.
entry_fields.origin: Etymology or source culture when useful.

pronunciation.respelling_en: Readable English-like respelling, e.g., 'kah-WA-ee' for kawaii.

semantics.sense: Core sense; akin to dictionary gloss.
semantics.reference: Concrete referent if any (e.g., 'YouTube Super Chat').

pragmatics.illocution: Speech act intent (react, tease, hype, soothe, command, etc.).
pragmatics.politeness_strategy: Brown & Levinson-ish: casual, honorific-light, playful-mock, etc.

prosody.pitch_semitones: Relative shift from neutral; positive = higher.
prosody.pace_wpm: Words per minute target for TTS baseline.
prosody.intonation: Contour keyword (rise-fall, fall-rise, level, gentle-rise, firm-fall...).

entry_fields.triggers_regex: Regex to detect this exact token in chat for on-the-fly routing or SFX.

phonetics_notes:
• Phonemic (/slashes/) vs phonetic [brackets]: Phonemic marks contrastive sounds in a language;
  phonetic shows finer detail (allophones, aspiration). Broad vs narrow maps directly to TTS models
  that accept IPA; use phonemic for routing and phonetic to nudge timbre (e.g., devoicing).
• Morphological transcription: Split into morphemes for compounds (e.g., yo + -ne, sen + -pai).
• JA terms: Prefer kana in 'jp_kana'; keep romaji lowercased; stress empty (JA is mora-timed).
